sentences.cn: 经过深思熟虑的、相互连贯的论点

sentences.en: Becker has never been the most consistent of players anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，贝克尔从来就不是表现最为稳定的球员。

sentences.en: But the courts have not analyzed these issues in a consistent manner.
sentences.cn: 但法院并未前后一致地对这些问题作出分析.
格雷厄姆能持之以恒，始终如一。

sentences.en: He is not consistent in his action.
His account of what happened was consistent.
sentences.cn: 他对于所发生事情的叙述前后一致.

sentences.en: His action is always consistent with his words.
She is a consistent girl in her feeling.
sentences.cn: 在感情方面她是个始终如一的女孩.

sentences.en: She's not very consistent in the way she treats her children.
She’s the team’s most consistent player.
sentences.cn: 她是该队中表现最为稳定的选手。

sentences.en: That has been our consistent stand.
There are consistent reports of electrical torture being practised on inmates.
sentences.cn: 一直有报道称犯人被施以电刑。

sentences.en: There has been consistent growth in GSM mobile subscribers.
sentences.cn: 全球通手机用户持续增长。

sentences.en: These actions are consistent with his principles.
sentences.cn: 这些行为与他的原则是一致的.

sentences.en: This result is consistent with the findings of Garnett & Tobin.
sentences.cn: 这个结果与加尼特托宾公司的调查结果一致。

sentences.en: Ward is not the most consistent of players, but when he is on song he looks a world-beater.
sentences.cn: 沃德并不是发挥最稳定的球员，可是一旦进入状态，他似乎就是天下无敌的王者。

sentences.en: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.cn: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

sentences.en: You have to fancy Bath because they are the most consistent team in England.
sentences.cn: 巴斯队一定会赢，因为他们是英格兰表现最稳定的球队。

trans.tran_cn: 一致的，连贯的，始终如一的
trans.tran_en: a consistent argument or idea does not have any parts that do not match other parts
